name: Radiant Silver Sword
description:
THIS GAME REQUIRES AN XBOX GAMEPAD!

Radiant Silver Sword is a shoot'em up where you simply don't shoot.

Your spaceship has a sword, can drop bombs and use a shield. You must face multiple waves of enemies.

Be careful, this game is hard. Even I cannot beat it :p .

Thanks to Mark Brown for creating this GMTK Game Jam! I learnt a lot from it!
